module.name: interconnect_module_with_macros
module.keywords: module, interconnect substrate, macro, design, electrical, electronic, design

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of interconnect substrates that include design macros.

inscope.li: items within the scope of Component_feature_arm;
items within the scope of Interconnect_module_usage_view_arm;
items within the scope of Layered_interconnect_module_design_arm;
items within the scope of Physical_unit_design_view_arm.
